chunks.zh: [餐刻 App] 解锁你的美食之旅：免费促销码等你领取！
chunks.en: [Meal Carve App] Unlock your culinary journey: Free promo codes are waiting for you!

chunks.zh: 作为一个业余编程爱好者，在疫情期间，我开发了一款食谱软件，主要是为了满足个人的一些需求。
chunks.en: As an amateur programming enthusiast, I developed a recipe app during the pandemic, mainly to meet some personal needs.

chunks.zh: 一方面，我经常会纠结于每天吃什么；另一方面，虽然短视频应用逐渐取代了传统的食谱软件，提供了丰富的烹饪视频，但我发现自己需要一个专门的空间来收藏我喜欢的食谱视频，而不是在那些功能繁多的短视频平台上。
chunks.en: On the one hand, I often struggle with what to eat every day; on the other hand, although short video apps have gradually replaced traditional recipe apps and provide a wealth of cooking videos, I find myself needing a dedicated space to store my favorite recipe videos, rather than on those feature-rich short video platforms.

chunks.zh: 出于这样的思考，“餐刻”App 应运而生。
chunks.en: With this in mind, the 'Meal Carve' App came into being.

chunks.zh: 它的核心功能包括随机生成食谱和收藏来自各大短视频平台的食谱视频，提供一个独立的空间来浏览这些内容。
chunks.en: Its core features include randomly generating recipes and collecting recipe videos from various short video platforms, providing an independent space to browse these contents.

chunks.zh: 毕竟，美食关乎生活的乐趣，是我们日常生活中不可或缺的一部分。
chunks.en: After all, food is about the joy of life and an indispensable part of our daily lives.

chunks.zh: 这款软件是免费提供的，并包含内购选项。
chunks.en: This software is provided free of charge and includes in-app purchase options.

chunks.zh: 我在这里分享了一些促销码供大家使用，也欢迎通过私信我来获取更多促销码。
chunks.en: I'm sharing some promo codes for you to use here, and you're also welcome to PM me to get more promo codes.

chunks.zh: 我必须承认，软件在设计和功能上还比较初级，如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题或有任何建议，我非常希望听到您的反馈。
chunks.en: I must admit that the software is still relatively rudimentary in design and functionality. If you encounter any problems or have any suggestions during use, I would very much like to hear your feedback.

chunks.zh: 可以在 App Store 中给出你的真实评价，也可以给我留言或者私信，谢谢🙏
chunks.en: You can give your honest review in the App Store, or leave me a message or PM, thank you🙏

chunks.zh: 最后，愿大家在新的一年里身体健康，万事如意！
chunks.en: Finally, I wish you all good health and all the best in the new year!

chunks.zh: 软件链接： https://apps.apple.com/cn/app/%E9%A4%90%E5%88%BB/id1640224130
chunks.en: Software link: https://apps.apple.com/cn/app/%E9%A4%90%E5%88%BB/id1640224130

chunks.en: 6T9AMHM3JA3Y, used, thank you

chunks.zh: "软件在设计和功能上还比较初级", 却包含内购选项。
chunks.en: 'The software is still relatively rudimentary in design and functionality,' yet it includes in-app purchase options.

chunks.zh: 内购已经不算初级功能了，建议还是先完善产品,等有一定用户基础而且用户确实体现出他们有内购需要时再做这个功能
chunks.en: In-app purchase is no longer a basic function. It is recommended to improve the product first, and then implement this function when there is a certain user base and users actually show that they need in-app purchases.

chunks.en: @matrix1010 Thank you very much for your suggestion :)

chunks.zh: 有个建议：放盐、糖等步骤可以根据要做的分量明确到几克
chunks.en: Here's a suggestion: steps such as adding salt and sugar can be specified to a few grams depending on the amount to be made.
